name: Unnamed Protagonist
description:
DISCLAIMER: THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT ALSO A DISCLAIMER: THIS GAME IS DARK, PLEASE WARN ALL VIEWERS OF THIS FACT AS IT MAY DISTURB SOME PEOPLE ALSO CONTAINS VIOLENCE, DRUG REFERENCES AND SOMEWHAT IMMATURE HUMOUR YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED

In Eighty-Three our fates were cast

By monsters slain in ages past,

For two long years it was our scourge

Until the gods had a great urge

To cast the demon from this plain,

To stop our minds becoming insane,

A champion sealed the beast away,

Trapped in the darkness 'til today,

But in its death it spoke a curse

To make this realm require a hearse,

It will bring fear to all around,

And raze all worlds into the ground,

There is nothing that you can do,

The Nonexistence comes for you

Welcome To The Unnamed Realm
  • Explore the vast world!
  • Meet creatures and ¿suɐɯnɥ
  • Fight epic bosses because that's cool.
  • And much more!
Stay Alive!
  • Fight through the world
  • Unlock something I guess, it's a metroidvania.
  • Revel in the immersive gameplay
  • Do not die

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Right Click - Fire

G - Use item
